section.para: To view Sales history by Customer Type, select the "Sales History by Customer Type" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Sales history by Customer Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Sales history for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Sales history by Customer Type for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Sales history by Customer Type you want to display.
Select to include Costs in the display.
Select to include Prices in the display.
Sales history by Customer Type generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Sales history by Customer Type generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Display lists Sales history by Customer Type, using the specified parameters. Prices are normalized to the Base Currency using the Currency Exchange Rate effective on the Invoice Date.
